quest.name: Presence of the Enemy
journal: Komuxio of Little Solace would entrust you with a task.
Komuxio is troubled by sightings of unfamiliar walking ones in the forest. Speak to the residents of Little Solace and the Hawthorne Hut and uncover what information you can.
Your investigation proved a fruitful one. Return to Little Solace and share your findings with Komuxio.
Upon learning of the sightings of strange men clad in steel, Komuxio has bid you venture into the forest to investigate. Be on the lookout for signs of imperial incursion.

Stumbling upon a stack of suspicious boxes, you are attacked by a group of imperial soldiers. After fending them off, you search the boxes to uncover a quartermaster's log detailing a list of imperial supplies for delivery. Return to Little Solace and share with Komuxio this troubling development.
Komuxio deduces that the log must have been penned by someone with knowledge of the forest. Could there be a traitor in your midst?
objectives: Search for clues in the forest.
Deliver the quartermaster's log to Komuxio.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one asks dancing one for forgiveness. These ones have many troubles since walking ones last came to our abode. This one must be careful. Always careful.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: But dancing one is not like other walking ones. This one can trust dancing one. This one would ask dancing one for help.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Strange walking ones with bodies of steel come to the home of these ones. This one thinks steel ones come from Empire.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Where Empire goes, many living ones become dead ones. Trees fall and bushes burn. These ones' home is in danger. Danger!

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one begs of dancing one to help this one know more. Dancing one is friends with these ones and walking ones, yes? Dancing one must speak to these ones here and walking ones in hut-house and find out more.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one has bad feeling. This one fears steel ones are after something. But this one should speak no more. Go, dancing one. This one depends on kindness of dancing one.

dialogue.name: PELIXIA
dialogue.text: Strange steel walking ones? Yes, this one has seen. Steel walking ones carry big boxes. Maybe walking ones hunt for shiny treasure? This one likes treasure!

dialogue.name: NATHAXIO
dialogue.text: Shush! Shush, this one says! Steel walking ones are scary, like touched ones... This one hates scary! And scary ones have scary friends...

dialogue.name: MONNE
dialogue.text: Men clad in strange armor? Why, now that you mention it, I did see some suspicious types of late. They were gathering deep in the forest. I simply assumed they were adventurers...

dialogue.name: VICTOR
dialogue.text: Fearsome types clad head to toe in steel, you say? Imperial soldiers, no doubt. I couldn't tell you what they're plotting, but I'm sure it's nothing good.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one is happy to see dancing one return. What did dancing one learn?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one sees. Steel walking ones come from Empire. Carry boxes, and go walking deep, deep through trees.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: As this one thought! Steel walking ones are up to nasty, no-good things.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one knows forest well. Steel walking ones try to hide, but this one will find them.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one would borrow dancing one's map. This one makes markâ”€right here! This is where steel ones hide, this one knows. Dancing one will go looking for steel ones, yes?

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Dancing one is back. This one breathes sigh of relief. This one was worried. Hm? Dancing one found something?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Dancing one found paper inside of box? This is a message from Empire?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one can read walking ones' symbols. Message-paper has names of food and rocks. Food and rocks were inside boxes, this one knows.

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: But this one does not understand. Food and rocks mentioned all come from home of these ones. How do steel walking ones know to find them?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: Is there sneaky one hiding behind this one's wings? Snooping one selling secrets to steel walking ones?

dialogue.name: KOMUXIO
dialogue.text: This one fears for this one's home. But dancing one has helped this one much today. Dancing one must promise to always be friend to these ones.

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!

dialogue.name: ACCESS
dialogue.text: The enemy is still about!
